summary: A law school graduate is hired by a top law firm, but hides from them a secret about a problem he has. He is so allergic to alcohol that one whiff of it and he passes out like a light.
cast: Van Johnson|Elizabeth Taylor|Percy Waram|Fay Holden|Leon Ames|Edgar Buchanan|Selena Royle|Gene Lockhart|Rosemary DeCamp|Philip Ahn|Gordon Richards|Matt Moore|Pierre Watkin|Russell Hicks|Dino Bolognese|Cliff Clark|Lyle Clark|Tristram Coffin|The Country Gentlemen|Bert Davidson|Bob Davis|Lester Dorr|Jay Eaton|Charles Evans|Bess Flowers|Everett Glass|A. Cameron Grant|Stuart Holmes|Brett King|Kathleen Lockhart|Louise Lorimer|Mickey McCardle|Philo McCullough|Harold Miller|Bert Moorhouse|Anna Q. Nilsson|Loulie Jean Norman|Elsa Peterson|John Rosser|Cosmo Sardo|Fred Shellac|J. Lewis Smith|Peter M. Thompson|John Valentine|Gayne Whitman
title: Cicatrices del recuerdo
